overview: Who knew that young gorgeous female students lust after their male teachers? Even Dakota, who is saving herself for marriage, has fantasies about her teacher! Starring sassy and sexy Dakota Skye, cute and cuddly Ariana Grand, voracious and vivacious Alaina Kristar and sensual and scintillating Keisha Grey. With Steven St. Croix, Mr. Pete, Erik Everhard, Seth Gamble and Veronica Hart as Dakota's mom.
title: Student Bodies 3
